content.raw:
If it helps, my system is pretty generic with respect to network setup. I'm somewhat new to Linux so haven't messed with the hosts file or networking. I've wired and WiFi adapters. 

I tried ROS_MASTER_URI as localhost and 127.0.0.1 and they both work. ROS_IP does want an IP and rejects localhost. It falls back to the ~/.ihmc directory for network information. That file uses localhost and it all works fine.
